name: Fire Power (James Daniels)
overview: A split screen combat and collect the flags game for multi-play combat scenarios on a randomly generated playing field. In this game, which supports up to 6 players, with any number of them as computer controlled, one person only acts as the driver OR the gunner of each tank, not both! The screen is divided into 3 sections, one for each team. Great party game to see who can act as an effective team!
